  • Konstruktordetails

    • Menu

      public Menu(PlayerMenuUtility playerMenuUtility)
      The Menu function is the main function of this class. It creates a menu for the player to interact with, and allows them to choose what they want to do next. The Menu function takes in no parameters.
      Parameter:
      playerMenuUtility - Pass the playermenuutility object to the menu class

    • legacyServer

      protected boolean legacyServer()
      The legacyServer function checks the server version and returns true if it is 1.12 or older, false otherwise. This is used to determine whether to use legacy methods for certain things like setting a player's skin (which changed in 1.13).
      Gibt zurück:
      A boolean value, true or false

    • open

      public void open()
      The open function is the main function that opens a menu. It creates an inventory, sets the items in it, and then opens it for the player.

    • openThreadSafe

      public void openThreadSafe()
      Opens a menu for the player. This function is thread-safe.

    • getInventory

      public org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory getInventory()
      The getInventory function returns the inventory of the player.
      Angegeben von:
      getInventory in Schnittstelle org.bukkit.inventory.InventoryHolder
      Gibt zurück:
      The inventory object

    • setFillerGlass

      public void setFillerGlass()
      The setFillerGlass function is used to fill the empty slots in a player's inventory with glass panes. This function is called when a player opens their inventory, and it ensures that all of the empty slots are filled with glass panes.

    • makeItem

      public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack makeItem(org.bukkit.Material material, String displayName, String... lore)
      The makeItem function is a function that creates an ItemStack with the given parameters.
      Parameter:
      material - Set the material of the item
      displayName - Set the name of the item
      lore - Make the lore variable a string array
      Gibt zurück:
      An itemstack

    • getSlot

      public int getSlot(String path, int defaultInt)
      The getSlot function is used to get the slot of an item.
      Parameter:
      path - Get the path of the item
      defaultInt - Set a default value for the slot if it is not found in the config
      Gibt zurück:
      The slot of the item
